name: Lupo y las Ardillas
description:
Hi there,

I had a blast doing this shit with GameBoy Studio!

The controls are arrows: up, down, left & right, alt action. If you are playing from a mobile device the controllers on your screen.

Special thanks to Pixel Pete who taught me all that I needed, and he's an amazing artist!

Sorry, the game it's in Spanish, but I hope my niece will play it... anyway the story is not great hehehe

Thanks buddy, thanks for sharing!
